first.name: Letharia
first.content: It's unfortunate that we're meeting under such circumstances.

1.content: But whatever, let's not get distracted.@Palmerston's already sent me a message detailing our situation.

2.content: ...Do you know how dangerous the great litterbox is?

3.content: I get that you're on an important mission -

3_a.content: but I cannot in good conscience allow you to wander aimlessly in the desert looking for clues.

knowledge_off.name: Letharia
knowledge_off.content: Have you heard? The shifting sands of the Great Litterbox are unforgiving.

knowledge_off_1.content: There's a digital encyclopedia installed on our main computer system.

knowledge_off_2.content: Talk to me again after you've researched some basic survival techniques.

knowledge_off_3.content: If you do this, I'll send you on a mini mission.

5.content: I see it in your eyes... All of the new information you learned.

7.content: Allow me to hold up my end of this deal.

8.content: There's an interesting cave near the top of the smaller hill at Groundcat Creek.

9a.content: Follow it for as long as you can, and you'll end up somewhere called Gjásara Headwaters.

10.name: Letharia
10.content: There's a researcher there who's apparently discovered new information that might assist us in our efforts.

11.content: Ask him about his encounter with a strange monster while doing fieldwork.

12.content: He was posting about it on the Meowser, regaling everyone with tales of an epic battle between him and a mystery creature...

chrysoberyl_off.name: Letharia
chrysoberyl_off.content: Have you found the cave to Gjásara Headwaters yet?

chrysoberyl_off_1.content: You'll find the connecter-cave at Groundcat Creek -

chrysoberyl_off_2.content: It's right by that weird cat that's always hanging above the cliff for fun.

chrysoberyl_on.name: Letharia
chrysoberyl_on.text: Did you find any important information on your trip?

chrysoberyl_on_2.content: I see it in your eyes... All of the new information you learned.

chrysoberyl_on_4.content: Ted's not the most focussed scientist I've met, but his research is better than none I suppose... Is that a crystal you have there?

no_option_2.name: Feline
no_option_2.content: ...Uh, actually we do have something to show you

no_option_3.name: Feline
no_option_3.content: It's a Chrysoberyl sample we found that might be our ticket to stopping these random monster attacks from happening.

no_option_4.name: Feline
no_option_4.content: It scrambles their signals, and momentarily stops them from being such jerks.

no_option_5.name: Feline
no_option_5.content: Maybe we can harness this power to protect ourselves while out in the desert.

no_option_6.name: Letharia
no_option_6.content: That sounds easy enough. I could make some sort of a laser-pointer out of the crystal.@...

no_option_7.name: Letharia
no_option_7.content: ...Sorry, but I'll need some time to engineer this new invention. Please be patient, it could take me anywhere from a few weeks to a few months.

no_option_8.name: Letharia
no_option_8.content: In the meantime, I suggest you take it easy and relax.

no_option_9.name: Letharia
no_option_9.content: It's been a stressful few months, and you'll need all your strength replenished if you want to stand a chance out in the desert.

no_option_10.name: Letharia
no_option_10.content: ...Thanks for hanging on. I'm sure the direction fate seems to have thrown you in is a meaningful one.
